to_date.description: Converts some column values to date type.

cols.description: The name(s) of the column(s) to convert.

fmt.description: The date parsing format to use

to_tzdate.description: Converts some column values to date type from ISO string         with timezone info.

cols.description: The name(s) of the column(s) to convert.

fdate.description: Converts specified columns to formatted date strings.

cols.description: Names of columns to convert to formatted date strings.

precision.description:
Precision level of date format string.
Defaults to "S" (seconds).
Possible values: "S" (seconds), "Min" (minutes), "H" (hours), "D" (days),
"M" (months), "Y" (years).

newcol.description: Name of the new column to create. Defaults to "fdate".

timestamps.description: Adds a new column with timestamps from one or more specified date columns.

*cols.description: Names of columns to convert to timestamps.

name.description: Name of the new column to create. Defaults to "timestamps".
